Planēs apokalypsis Popery manifested, or, The papist incognito made known : by way of dialogue betwixt a papist priest, Protestant gentleman, and Presbyterian divine : in two parts : intended for the good of those that shall read it / by L.B.P. L. B. P.
[12], 52, [4], 75, [1] p.
Printed for R.C. ..., London : 1673.
Title transliterated from Greek. Marginal notes. Errata on p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
